doyoumind.client package¶

Submodules¶

doyoumind.client.client module¶

doyoumind.client.client.filter_snapshot(snap, config)¶

Update the snapshot so it’ll only have the fields described in config. :param snap: the snapshot about to be sent to the server :type snap: doyoumind_pb2.Snapshot :param config: the configuration of available topics :type config: protocol.Config

doyoumind.client.client.get_config(conn)¶
doyoumind.client.client.send_hello(conn, hello_msg)¶
doyoumind.client.client.send_snapshot(conn, snap_msg)¶
doyoumind.client.client.upload_sample(host, port, path, read_type='protobuf')¶

Upload the sample from the file to the server, using the hello–>config–>snapshot protocol. WARNING: only the protobuf reader has been tested- this may lead to problems when using a binary reader!

Parameters

  • host (str, optional) – the server’s host, defaults to ‘127.0.0.1’ in the CLI

  • port (int, optional) – the server’s port, defaults to 8000 in the CLI

  • path (str) – the path for the sample path

  • read_type (str, optional) – the type of reader for the file, defaults to ‘protobuf’
